descriptionHTML:
The best Samsung Smart TV, and Universal IR Remote, with more than 1.5M downloads, supporting Samsung Smart TVs from 2011 - 2017, and millions of other TVs, and Home Electronic devices.

FEATURES 📺
✓ Control your Samsung Smart TV with your Android device
✓ Control any TV, AC, AVR, Disc Player, Home Automation, Media Streamer, Set Top Box, or Projector
✓ Text Input for Samsung Smart TV
✓ Start Samsung Eden TV App (2016+)
✓ Switch theme automatically based on day/night
✓ DLNA Server & Viewer
✓ Custom Remote Control Layouts
✓ Favourite TV Channels
✓ TV Remote
✓ AC Remote, Air Conditioner Remote
✓ Widgets


Samsung Smart TVs 📺
✓ 2010 C6500+
✓ 2011 D7000+, PDP D8000+
✓ 2012 ES7500+, PDP E8000+
✓ 2013 F4500+ (except F9000 and above), PDP F5500+
✓ 2014 H4500+, H5500+ (except H5201, H5203, H6003/H6103/H6153/H6201/H6203)
✓ 2015 J4500+, J5500+ (except J6203)
✓ 2016 K4300+, K5300+

Universal Remote IR
✓ TV Remote (e.g. Philips, Sharp, LG, Panasonic, Sony, Toshiba, etc.)
✓ AV Reciever Remote (e.g. Harman Kardon, Denon, Pioneer, Onkyo, etc.)
✓ Set Top Box (e.g. TiVo)
✓ Blueray & Disk Player (e.g. XBOX, various CD/DVD/Blueray Players)
✓ Home Automation

Supported IR Phones / Tablets
✓ Samsung Galaxy S4 to S6
✓ HTC and Medion devices with IR Blaster
✓ Android 4.4+ with IR Blaster

Note: this app is not an official Samsung or Samsung affiliate product.
comments: It works great with my new Samsung 6 Series 55 Curve TV
Glitches buttons stick. Have to close and reopen app constantly
Didn't work for my device but it looks good.
It works when it wants and it never turns on my tv
Easy to set up and user friendly
recentChanges: Compatibility with latest Samsung Smart TV. Support for Universal IR (TV, Air Conditioner, and Home Electronic devices). Stability Improvements.
